column5: I have also started binging again. Always in the middle of the night around 12am-2am. I’m embarrassed and ashamed right after I do it.. yet it happens day after day. Just know you’re not alone.
Sorry for this late reply 😬 I have lots of shopping triggers.. when I’m happy, when I’m sad, to “treat myself”, passing by the store on my way home.. basically anything 😭
Sending you virtual hugs. You are not in this alone. ❤️
I’m proud of you! I have this exact same problem at you.. mine is currently still cluttered.
